fi.ana.gui

Class GraphicalUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.ana.gui.GraphicalUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class GraphicalUI
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Creates the UI in which the game runs.
